name: The Revenge Of The Demon
description:
This game is a submission for Weekly Game Jam Week 150

FEATURES:

==============================================

  • Play in a procedurally generated dungeon crawler with a twist
  • You are the enemy your goal is to kill the angel (don't blame me for your karma though)
  • Click and wait melee combat
  • You need to find portals to progress into the next level

CONTROLS:

==============================================

  • Use WASD to move the enemy
  • Use left mouse button to attack
  • Use E to open your inventory

CREDITS:
